projects.name: BrailleBEE
projects.description: Built a userfriendly solution that can extract and process text and images from scanned academic textbooks and convert them into braille ready format with contextual descriptions for visually challenged students. Implemented a robust WebApp architecture supporting multiple PDF uploads and processing, multilingual capabilities, Bcrypt security, and digital inclusivity features. Integrated a Node application with a Python engine to achieve a processing time of 30 seconds for a 10page PDF. Provided users with output options including download and viewing of the generated document file. Leveraged technologies such as the MERN stack, Layout Parser, Tesseract, Hugging Face, OpenCV, and Salesforce IMC.

projects.name: AI Smart Board
projects.description: A virtual whiteboard platform leveraging hand gesture recognition technology to enhance remote collaboration and learning experiences. Integration of hand gesture recognition into the platform, allowing users to intuitively draw, erase, and manipulate content with simple gestures, revolutionizing traditional whiteboard interactions. Integrated a Personal Voice Assistant, enabling intuitive navigation and control through natural language commands, enhancing accessibility and user experience.

projects.name: Dynamic Expense Sharing Application - Convin Project
projects.description: Developed Django based application with PostgreSQL, handling user management, authentication and dynamic expense splitting methods among different users. Implemented and documented secure RESTful APIs: Facilitated user and expense management with features like dynamic balance sheet generation. Optimized data handling: Utilized streaming responses for large datasets and wrote comprehensive test cases to ensure application reliability.
